name: SimulationTesting(FantasyPong)
description:
This is a prototype of some pong simulation. It features two AIs competing in pong with randomised stats so 'each match is different'.  Idk if you can really call this a game, but I'm only uploading it here for testing and cataloguing purposes. Feel free to download, but keep your expectations real low. This is my first game so if by any chance (0% ) you decide to try this out , feel free to tell me how bad of a programmer i am or just perhaps give feedback :))

Features:

  • Randomised names!
  • Random stats !
  • Not full screen!
  • No bugs! (not true)
  • One of the randomised stats probably doesn't work! (Trip Chance)
  • A 'retry' button so you don't have to restart the program!

In Game Stats:

Trip Chance probably doesnt work , but it was intended to slow down the affected AI for a second or two.

Power Strike simply increased the speed of the ball.

Blunder Strike simply slows down the ball

Adv Strike increases the ball speed ( can only be done if the ball is under a certain speed)
